name: Mr.Toad's Speed Racer
description:
Mr. Toad's Speed Racer! Take to the road as Mr.Toad.

A thrillingly fun adventure inspired by The Wind And The Willows by Kenneth Grahame.

This game was made by Morgan Skillicorn with artwork by Brett Ebner as part of Mini Jam 106: Frogs²

To make it we used a couple of assets including Edy's vehicle physics, Low poly farm, Low poly car park and Free low poly pack!

Morgan did all the programming and in-engine work and Brett modeled the incredible Mr. Toad and his motor car!

Objective:

Travel as far as you can before the time runs out!

Controls:

Drive - W/S or Gamepad Triggers

Steer - A/D or Gamepad Left Thumbstick

Handbrake - Space or Gamepad A/X Button

Reset Car - Return or Gamepad Y/Triangle Button

Poop Poop! - Gamepad Left Thumbstick Button

Return To Menu - Escape

This game runs best in full-screen mode!

There is a known bug where sometimes the time bonus pickups don't work in WebGL, I just haven't had time to fix it! The windows build should work though if you want to download that :D
